entries.text: Thank you for calling our customer service. If you wish to cancel your subscription, please press 1.
I want to cancel my subscription.
You have selected to cancel your subscription. Please hold while we connect you to a representative.
Hello, this is Lisa from the retention team. How can I assist you today?
I’m calling because I want to cancel my subscription. It’s just too expensive for me right now.
I understand how that can be frustrating. Can I ask what specifically feels too expensive about it?
I’ve seen better offers from other companies, and I really don’t see the value in staying.
We definitely value your loyalty, and I’d like to see if we can find a solution. Let me check if we can offer you something better.
I really just want to cancel my subscription. I’ve made up my mind.
I completely understand, but please give me a moment to see if any of our current promotions can help.
I appreciate that, but I don’t want to waste more time. I’m ready to close my account.
I assure you, I’m here to help. Sometimes we can provide discounts that might appeal to you.
Look, I just don’t want this service anymore. It’s not worth the cost to me.
I hear you, and I’m committed to finding a resolution. Would you be open to discussing a lower plan instead of canceling?
No, I want to cancel my subscription. Nothing you say will change my mind.
I understand. Let me transfer you to another agent who may have different options to help you.
Hi, this is Mark from the retention team. I understand you're looking to cancel your subscription. What can I do to help?
I want to cancel my subscription. I’m done with this. It’s too expensive, and I’ve had it.
I see, but we might have some retention offers that could make this more affordable for you. May I share them with you?
No, I’ve heard enough. I just want to close my account right now.
I completely understand your frustration, but can I at least try to explain the options available?
I don’t want options! I just want to cancel!
I’m sorry to hear that you feel this way. Please allow me just a moment to process your cancellation request.
No, I’m hanging up. This is a waste of my time.
